website_summaries.verdict: A clear backpack with an affordable price and few quality concerns. A good deal if you want a sturdy option that allows you to save a few dollars.
pros: Has a lot of space and a price that's a bit lower than some competing options
Straps have padding that adds to their comfort
cons: PVC is on the stiff side, but it tends to loosen up with use

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack, I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack, I highly recommend. I’ve been using it everyday for the past 3 weeks with no problems. Side pockets are great for water bottles and straps are nice and thick.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Good, spacious backpack, large enough to fit lots of stuff
customer_reviews.text: This backpack does what it's supposed to do. It's large and pretty spacious, so I can fit plenty of items in it. I got this backpack to wear at Bonnaroo because the event implemented a new security policy banning all backpacks except for clear ones. This backpack was large enough to fit a change of clothes, a beach towel and other miscellaneous items. I now use it frequently while camping and hiking. It's size makes it work well for carrying water or Gatorade, bug spray, a small blanket or towel, a change of clothes and a snack or three.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: I can see clearly now...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The bag seems to be holding up we'll. I am usually hard on things and the backpack is doing ok.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD  F.

customer_reviews.title: Bryan M
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag for work at the air port bc it has to be see through and this is a perfect strong bag, I highly recommend you buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT backpack for adults, too -- can't BELIEVE it's only $20!
customer_reviews.text: This is a full-size backpack that's comfortable for adults. The material is heavy duty and crystal clear (not cloudy). The straps are comfortably padded and adjustable. The zippers work smoothly and feel sturdy. Will fit anything your kid needs for school (books, binders, lunch) or anything a worker might want to carry to the office daily. I work in a government setting where everything goes through an X-ray machine (hence, the need for a CLEAR backpack) and this has been a GREAT purchase. If it ever wears out, I'm buying another one, same brand and company. I can't believe it's only $20 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The backpack is bigger than I expected, which was I was pleasantly surprised. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I bought this same backpack last year when our district switched to clear backpacks. It lasted my 14 year old, rough and messy son until the last month of school when a strap broke. I gave him a cheaper one as a backup. I really didn’t expect it to last almost all year so this was a keeper for me which is why I reordered it for this year.
customer_reviews.author: KarenSue32

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Updated Review as of 12.7.2018: I bought these in September and It has fallen apart COMPLETELY. The straps came off the upper part of the backpack and the seem has ripped off completely. A waste. Its only been 3 months at best. Irritating. So far so good. They are put together very well. Thick material.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Ellzey

customer_reviews.title: Short term use bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great to bring to a sporting event/concert! It holds a lot of stuff and keeps it protected from weather. However, the first day I used it the front pocket zipper ripped from where the plastic is sewed to the zipper. It's hard to find a plastic bag with durability that wont rip. I'm not really surprised but I wish it had happened after using it. The event I went to it was raining outside. Overall it held out.
customer_reviews.author: Firefly27

customer_reviews.title: Stow It
customer_reviews.text: It’s a decent backpack, I needed something for stadiums and fairgrounds that don’t allow bags in unless they’re see-through. This one fit the bill and is pretty cheap. I would probably say there’s not a lot of life to these though as it feels a little flimsy but you get what you pay for and if I can squeeze a few more concerts out of this the. It guess it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Great clear backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, really liked it. I returned it thought as backpacks, clear or not, were not acceptable at the local professional baseball park. In the future if I need to order a clear backpack, I'll go with this same product,
customer_reviews.author: Rickard Simon

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review without seeing or touching these backpacks in person. I bought these for my grandkids who live in another state. Their school required clear backpacks. My grandkids love them, say they are comfortable and are pleased they they arrived quickly and were packaged nicely. So far they have no complaints and Grandma is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Zehner

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart after a few weeks!
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I thought it would be. It’s a struggle to fit 3, 1” binders plus folders and whatnot. It will close, but barely. **Update: we bought THREE of these before we learned our lesson. The zippers pop open and break SO easily. The straps pop off from the plastic after a few weeks. Durable is NOT a word I’d use to describe this.
customer_reviews.author: JagWifey

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag.
customer_reviews.text: I use this at work. Only clear bags are allowed. I carry various items, even small printers, a tape gun, knives, With it being clear, I can see the dirt easily. I work around greasy equipment and sharp metal corners.
customer_reviews.author: pcnluvDi

customer_reviews.title: Big and durable
customer_reviews.text: Work requires clear or no bags, the one they issue was inadequate- this is full backpack sized not a little purse size! And super tough, as I forgot to scotch guard it, the straps got filthy, so I crossed my fingers and threw it in a cold wash cycle. Not even on gentle as I had tons of laundry to do. Obviously, don’t dry, but I am loving this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Ruckman

customer_reviews.title: Great for events where you need a clear bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a music festival where you had to use a clear bag and it worked well for 3-days. Zippers and straps were sturdy. I don't know how it would hold up for daily usage, but it served my purposes. I plan to use it for future events where a clear bag is necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Bag looks good but its fragile. First time i used it it broke. What can i say? You get what you pay for. Maybe the seller will read this and replace mine. If i where you id be very careful if you buy it because it will break
customer_reviews.author: John G Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Quality is very good and the colors are good enough for the boys
customer_reviews.text: I have to buy it because it's the school requirement. It will fit a 1/2 zipper binder but not bigger (like Case It, Five Star, or Cloth with Zipper binders). It will be too hard to zip up a bigger binder at the top because of the corners of the binder. Quality is very good and the colors are good enough for the boys. There is enough room for library books, 1/2 inch binder, a small clear pencil bag. I hope this last the whole year without the plastic tearing.
customer_reviews.author: BlawBlaw

customer_reviews.title: Not durable, stiff plastic.
customer_reviews.text: Son used only 2 weeks for middle school so far & the bottom where strap attaches has ripped open about 2-3 inches & strap is about to come off. He carries maybe 5-10 lbs tops per day. Also plastic is very stiff, not flexible at all. I believe that's why it ripped at seam. Not made to hold much weight. Only thing it's good for is being water resistant (if theres no holes) & the fact that you can see inside without opening.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strap breaks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag to use on our Disney vacation to get through the bag check lines quicker. It worked good on the first day and then the second day the strap broke. Only had a water bottle, camera, cooling towels and poncho in there. Not very heavy at all. Luckily the strap broke in a spot I was able to tie it in a knot to get through the rest of the day. Was able to get 1 use out of it and now it’s a throw away. If you buy it hopefully you have better luck.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great clear vinyl bag
customer_reviews.text: Great Vinly quality backpack, pretty big to fit two sweaters in it and still have space for water container and stuff in the front packet. I carry a lot of things and so it fit in it nicely. I’d say it is medium size bag. I bought for a music festival that had a bag policy and they allowed it in fine. Pretty well see through and pretty sturdy. Had no problems. Plus great shoulders pads too.
customer_reviews.author: GN

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.  Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack! Loved it. Top quality. Great value. Unfortunately the security at Monster Jam took it from me saying it was bigger than allowed in the stadium. It’s full size. Wish I had been able to use it more than once.
customer_reviews.author: BDB

customer_reviews.title: Nice and roomy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and roomy with durable thick material. I used this for a comic convention to use the "no bag line" to get in quicker. Held an extra pair of size 7 wedge sneakers and plenty more. It wasn't uncomfortable to wear at all. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a lot of these clear backpacks and this is the only one that has really stood up for any length of time. I have a tendency to over pack and this one can handle it. It is made of plastic and it is not going to last as long as a nylon one will. It is still worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Clark

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Bought one and last about a week. The replacement began being used on January 6 and broke beginning of February. The refund/replacement ended January 31st. Yay us.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this brand
customer_reviews.text: We loved the fact that we found colorful backpacks. This literally lasted the first two weeks of school before the right strap and handle broke. Completely unusable.
customer_reviews.author: BrownEyes

customer_reviews.title: Roomy but broke after two days
customer_reviews.text: The book bag was very big and roomy but one strap broke on the second day of school and tried to repair it and it broke again by week two the other strap was breaking probably from so much weight on one strap but I also purchased another one for my other son and a month in a half in now to school and his is still holding up fine. Maybe the first was was just a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Conley

customer_reviews.title: Broken Strap
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased 4 of these backpacks over the past 2 years. Those that we purchased last year were great! They held up well. (We are still using one of them.) The last 2 we purchased have NOT been great! Our most recent purchase, made on 01/02/2020, already has a broken strap. This is normal high school usage. We have carried a laptop in the bag, but no textbooks. I do not consider this to be a "Deluxe" model.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Howes

customer_reviews.title: It’s good to be able to see items inside
customer_reviews.text: A part of the threaded area around zipper wasn’t attached. It’s good to be able to see items inside.. I used it for my Pet Med bag I take with me on vacations. Both of my dogs have health issues and the front zipper section I used for the most important meds I can grab quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy & Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like that these backpacks are sturdy. I bought a pink one last yer for school. Daughter wanted a different color this year.
customer_reviews.author: BNicoleE

customer_reviews.title: Really Small
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is good for a little kid but my son who’s a senior in high school and 5 9’ is now required to wear a clear bag. It’s TINY on him and looks ridiculous so keep that in mind when purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: newenglandgirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my job
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my job. Esecially when having to deal with security needing to check bags. Held up well in the rain and holds my umbrella and drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Bag size is deceptive
customer_reviews.text: This bag is not as large as it seems! A friend of mine bought the backpack first and it looked like a good size! When I received mine....it was SMALLER than my friend’s bag! Not happy with it at all! Not sure why the bags are different size when we ordered the same bag! NOT HAPPY!
customer_reviews.author: m peterson

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this before school started for my 8th grader. We are in February and this back pack hasn’t ripped, zippers work, spacious, can hold quite a bit of weight. I really expected to go through several of these and have been impressed with how well it’s held up
customer_reviews.author: sarah G

customer_reviews.title: Very durable for its price
customer_reviews.text: My large cup sometimes falls out but it is a 36 oz so not surprised. It’s holding up really well, cheaper ones usually have large holes near the zipper by now but this one is staying strong. Plan to buy again if this one ever rips, worth the extra $7.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for work
customer_reviews.text: Hubby is a corrections officer so his work bag has to be clear.. He likes this one because it's sturdy for plastic, regular bag sized and has pockets for organizing.
customer_reviews.author: E.M.

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt last very long,,,, 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag to carry my lunch in to work with me as we are required to have a clear bag at the prison I work at. After 5 months of use the carry handle and one of the shoulder straps both let go so now I am stuck using only the remaining shoulder strap until I the different one I ordered arrives...
customer_reviews.author: Kc C.

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Had it for 2 months and it ripped at the strap on the bottom the bag. Not a whole lotnofnoptionsbout there but be prepared to replace them constintley.
customer_reviews.author: C.W Moore

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy. Fell apart where strap is sewn to bottom of the plastic part. Return deadline was day before product fell apart. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KellyMac

customer_reviews.title: Good for a plastic backpack
customer_reviews.text: If you have to have one of these awful clear backpacks for school, this one should prevent you from having to buy multiple in one year at least. Had to have it for my senior year of High School and witnessed many of my friends and peers complaining about buying super cheap ones, and they just fall apart. By the end of the year mine just had a few small holes in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Baur

customer_reviews.title: I love my clear backpack
customer_reviews.text: I love my clear backpack. It has a good size, the extra pocket at tbe front is very helpful. The backpack is very handy when I go to the baseball games; and I have to pass the security checkpoint.. They love it because I don't need to open my backpack. They can see throu
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Son needed a clear backpack for school. Its nice and all but too small to fit his binders and other school books. Wish i could return and refund but we missed the return window. Not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, durable
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Holding up, stitched well, durable, easy to find all items. Working out well for school. Wish the bottle holders were expendable maybe? Over all does what it is intended.
customer_reviews.author: The Best

customer_reviews.title: Great clear backpack
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my junior high kids for school. Second month into school and it is still holding strong. Good solid backpack and roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the 3 backpacks I have ordered have already ripped and the zipper has broke on the same 2. I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THESE FOR BACKPACKS TO USE FOR SCHOOL. THEY ARE NOT STURDY ENOUGH
customer_reviews.author: Jamey H.

customer_reviews.title: Makes for an excellent diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a diaper bag for our airplane trip. I love being able to see what I'm reaching for and it's big enough to fit diapers, wipes, toys, change of clothes and more. It seems sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Powell

customer_reviews.title: Clear bag
customer_reviews.text: Side pockets are too small for bottles but other than that the bag if good
customer_reviews.author: CplB13

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack over all...
customer_reviews.text: I loved that the backpack was roomy and durable.. But was a little upset when the zipper broke after the second day of use...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 6 months. Didn’t use it for any heavy stuff
customer_reviews.author: Marta Gorecka

customer_reviews.title: Strap Broke in less than a week!
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, unfortunately not good! The shoulder strap broke within 6 days of my daughter using it for lightweight items. A complete waste of funds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good for high school.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for high school, which started in late August. It is now middle October and both sides are open. The mesh pockets are sewn into the lining so if the mesh tears it causes the bag to come apart. Both pockets tore at the seam and now I'm buying a new backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Rolando

customer_reviews.title: the plastic does feel thick and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: ordered this bag but my daughter still has not used it due to school has not started. the plastic does feel thick and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: SYLVIA E.

customer_reviews.title: NOT duarable.
customer_reviews.text: Bag isn't durable. Ripped the second day I got it
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Lang

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Durability is very good on this bag. Usually my daughter goes through backpacks very often. This one has lasted a while now.
customer_reviews.author: tishamarie

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: With the ew school rules, I had to get a clear backpack. A few months into the school year and this backpack has lasted perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very stiff
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my job in prison but it’s much stiffer than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Oswegomom

customer_reviews.title: These are regular size backpacks and look nice on my high school kids that are over 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: These are regular size backpacks and look nice on my high school kids that are over 6 feet tall. They are very strong and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Broke at the seems where the straps connect at the top of the backpack. Barely made it thru 3 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: It's an okay backpack
customer_reviews.text: It says water resistant but my stuff inside of it still got wet when it rained on it
customer_reviews.author: Paula Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on a music festival I went to. Material seems strong and even though I spent 12 hours in the rain, only the zippers got wet, everything in it seemed fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rogerio Dias

customer_reviews.title: Good sized backpack
customer_reviews.text: Got this for pridefest this year and it worked amazing. I do have to warn that it is like an oven when you're out in the sun and what not so I don't suggest putting food in here.
customer_reviews.author: Liz/ElliotTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag
customer_reviews.text: Works great for Football games where you can only have a clear bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Zero complaints.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. We use it as a diaper bag and have zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Easy and convenient for outdoor events that require a security ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy and convenient for outdoor events that require a security check.​ Alos makes it easy to see what items you have
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder strap unraveled after only 4 days
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, there is no option for giving 0 stars. My son started using his backpack on Monday, and today (Thursday) one of the nylon straps unraveled completely, rendering that side useless. I am extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Marie Berry

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and clear bagi liked it very much and recommend it for others
customer_reviews.author: Sayed Sultan

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable for high schoolers at all.
customer_reviews.text: My sons school requires clear or mesh bookbag. My son walks to school and needs to have protection. 1st one ripped before 30 days.. replacement ripped within 60 days. I wont get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Broken back strapped
customer_reviews.text: Need to exchanged, money back or fix my back pack strapped broke in the first week can you make it more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Isabel Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Great for airline workers.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for airport work where the clear bag is required. The front pocket fits an iPad perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: Received this backpack on November 2nd, Today on December 11, my son came home with a strap missing and the bottom blowm out. This is not sturdy for a midfle school boy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sick of these plastic backpacks
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Jan 18, and by today feb 25 it completely fell apart - of course trying to upload the pics and go figure “error” I am sure it started tearing prior for it to get ripped at the bottom and the black shoulder strap broke.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty good
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes it. We just got it so mot sure how long it will last will update after a month
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter likes her backpack! A good size for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Nese

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: Its plastic... so it will get sweaty against your back. We put a LOT of stuff in ours ( including 6 full water bottles).
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Straps Broker
customer_reviews.text: After only using the backpack for only 2 months the straps broke. Items in the backpack are not heavy. The plastic is durable, but the sewing of the straps to the bag is VERY weak. It's a nice looking backpack, just not sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: Thick
customer_reviews.text: I bought three for school. They held up so far and it’s been a few months!
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: bad quality, cheap material
customer_reviews.text: Bad quality and the worst part is , if you want to return it is more than value of the item , the backpack rip as soon my daughter put her books on it.
customer_reviews.author: L. macias

customer_reviews.title: Works for what I need
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty good for what I need!!! I use it to carry my stuff in and out of work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems durable and just what my grandson needed for school
customer_reviews.author: Kathyk

customer_reviews.title: Side pockets rip easy
customer_reviews.text: I got this particular one because trailmaker are a popular backpack brand.. but the side pockets,which my son used for his water bottle only, came apart completely within two months.. very disappointing..
customer_reviews.author: yasir rahman

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Hold Up.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time to buy this backpack. First one lasted the first semester. The second one lasted about 3 weeks. It again busted where the strap attaches at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bag is just as pictured & seems to have strong seams.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: This product did not last very long, the bag started ripping a couple months after I received the order. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Logan

customer_reviews.title: Summer backpacks
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 in different colors so my grandkids could keep their pool club stuff in them. Worked great
customer_reviews.author: lnkool

customer_reviews.title: Side mesh ripped in a few weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: Does not last. Mesh pockets ripped after a few weeks and the bottom fell out after 3 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Super Durable
customer_reviews.text: Only brand I trust to last. Others we've tried, tear easily.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Great for work
customer_reviews.text: Need a clear bag for my job and these hold up well for the stress they take since I know I put a lot in them. On the bright side; when I do have to replace it I get a new color!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Loften

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My son goes through 3 book bags a year so far so good. Good for students who need clear book bags.
customer_reviews.author: Tia K

customer_reviews.title: Great for Disney!!
customer_reviews.text: Best idea for theme parks. We are a Disney family and this was so great at security for the parks. All of the bag checkers commented on how great they are and it makes their job easier. Highly recommend for theme parks.
customer_reviews.author: Christina M Clark

customer_reviews.title: Everything stitched, ripped!
customer_reviews.text: Can't stand up to an 8th grade boy. 4 months of use and both mesh side pockets ripped and both straps broke. The plastic held up ok. If you buy this backpack buy at least 2 or 3 to last the school year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expect to buy one every 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 2 months, zipper already broken. I guess it is cheap for a reason.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable straps
customer_reviews.text: Durable plastic and comfortable straps. Used it for a field trip that required clear bags. Was very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious and durable Clear Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Needed it for work. It can easily carry my laptop and anything else I might wana bring with me to work. The straps are a good length for taller men. They are also really thick so im sure itll last a while for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: The strap ripped on the first day of school School!
customer_reviews.author: Cari

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: It has held up. No holes or any issues. Son loves it
customer_reviews.author: Mentoria

customer_reviews.title: Worked out great. Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Came early. More room inside than expected. Worked out great. Better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Charles L Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality backpack!
customer_reviews.text: The straps are strong and comfortable. The backpack is clear and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of 2

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Size is perfect to hold a lot of books and notebooks for 5th and 6th graders. Durable book bag too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 5 year old and it lasted him all year and still doesn’t have any sign of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: 13 year old daughter gives this 4 Stars. Backpack doesn’t keep its shape, but it is more durable than many of her classmates’ whose have already ripped the first of school.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Cacchione

product_meta.title: Deluxe Model Water Resistant Clear Backpacks for Men, Women, Kids, With Reinforced, Padded Back Support Straps
feature_bullets: SCHOOL BAG: This heavy duty transparent (see through) bookbag is also the perfect plastic backpack for travel, commuting to work, and getting through security almost anywhere
RAIN RESISTANT BACKPACK: With water bottle holder, easy hang handle, sturdy bottom, and finished, smooth seams. No sharp edges inside or out! Great for ages 8+

FEATURES: Two side mesh pockets, easy grip dual cloth & metal zippers, large capacity main compartment, & spacious front zippered pocket. Securely store books, folders, thermos, laptop, lunch, gym clothes, pens, calculators, and more
DIMENSIONS: 17” H x 13” W x 6.5” D. Front storage pocket measures 13” H x 10” W x .5” D
COMPOSITION: Constructed from quality, lightweight, totally odorless PVC materials
